resources.string:
App is a one-stop solution for all your home services’ needs with more than 20000 happy customers. You just need to book the order, and we ensure that it is done. A background verified service provider visits your home on-time and solves your problem in the most professional way. We are easy on the pocket and the best on quality standards. Our key services are – Home Cleaning, Appliance repair, Plumbing, Electrical installation , repairs, Carpentry services, Laundry service, Driver on Demand, Home painting, AC , Geyser repair, PC , Laptop repair, Pest Control, Car Wash, and more help services.Home Cleaning – Complete house cleaning and home spa services. We cover every nook and corner of your home and provide deep cleaning , Steam cleaning.
Laundry Service – Professional and high-quality Laundry services with free pick-up , delivery. We provide both regular and premium services as per your need, and ensure that it is super quick!
Driver on Demand Services – Select your pick-up point on and our professional driver will reach you in no time.
Carpet cleaning – We deep clean your carpets and flush out dust particles, termites and germs. Our state-of-the-art technologies is among the best and your carpet will look like new again.
Sofa cleaning services – We use a specialized multi-step process to clean your sofa. The Sofa-spa treatment is essential for the durability of your sofa, giving it a lengthy life.
Pest control services- Our pest control services are very effective. Simple, odorless and harmless are the key features. Rely on us to permanently get rid of cockroaches, ants, termites and bedbugs.
Electrical services – Our electricians are highly skilled and can help you with electric installation, removal, repair, and more. We ensure that they are professional, and follow all safety measures.
Plumbing services – All your plumbing-related problems will be taken care of. Our professionals are experts in fitting, installations, and drainage related issues.
AC services – Our services include – AC installation, repair, maintenance, fixing major and minor AC problems and AMCs.
Carpentry services – Our carpenters are trusted, and can deal with all your carpentry issues – repair, renovation, assembling of furniture, and making new furniture.
Car Spa – Our Car spa service takes care of both interior and exterior of your car, at the most affordable prices. The service is available at your doorstep.
PC , Laptop Repair – Our trained team takes care of all your software and hardware issues, quickly and your doorstep.
Refrigerator / Microwave / Washing Machine –When it comes to appliances, we are the best. We provide all the solutions for your fridge, microwave and washing machine.
Home painting – Serving you, the finest home painting services, to suit your style. Our professionals offer a wide range of color catalogues to choose from, which are fresh, durable and innovative.
Our key features: Background checked Experienced professional On time services Moneyback guarantee Standardized pricing We are currently operative in TamilNadu, Vellore, and soon going to offer our services in new cities..
User can Request for Specific Service needed From available list to there location.
Enter Service and location to search
